NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Young Professional, Lead Consultant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 09:16 IST
 National Health Mission
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 70,000 to 90,000




FOLLOW

The National Health Mission Kerala (NHM Kerala) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Young Professionals, Lead Consultant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, Any Degree, and Post-graduation can apply for the NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Kerala.

NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Young Professional	01	MBBS, Post-graduation
Lead Consultant	01	Any Degree, Post-graduation

NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 70 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Qualification.
Experience & Interview.

NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 70,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 90,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the NHM Kerala Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form.

Important Dates:

Starting date	19-08-2025
Closing date	30-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
